trans-unit.source: Indicates that the implementing property is interested in participating in activation and might not have provided a message sink.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a propriedade de implementação está interessada em que participam na ativação e poderá não ter fornecido um receptor de mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The IContextPropertyActivator interface is exposed on all <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context> properties that are interested in participating in activation and that might have not provided a message sink.
trans-unit.target: A interface IContextPropertyActivator está exposta em todos os <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>propriedades que estão interessadas nas participar na ativação e o que poderá não forneceu um receptor de mensagem.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>

trans-unit.source: Client <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context> properties send information in the construction message that their counterparts at the remote site could look for during activation.
trans-unit.target: Cliente <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>Propriedades enviam informações na mensagem de construção que os seus homólogos o site remoto foi procure durante a ativação.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>

trans-unit.source: IContextPropertyActivator is also used to collect information from the client and server context property and to deliver information from the server context properties to the client context properties when returning to the client <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>.
trans-unit.target: IContextPropertyActivator também é utilizado para recolher informações de propriedade de contexto cliente e o servidor e para fornecer informações do servidor de propriedades de contexto para as propriedades de contexto de cliente quando a devolver ao cliente <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>

trans-unit.source: Called on each client context property that has this interface, before the construction request leaves the client.
trans-unit.target: Chamado para cada propriedade de contexto de cliente que tenha esta interface, antes do pedido de construção deixa o cliente.

trans-unit.source: The context property can examine and manipulate the contents of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de contexto pode examinar e manipular os conteúdos do <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called on each server context property that has this interface, before the construction response leaves the server for the client.
trans-unit.target: Chamado para cada propriedade de contexto de servidor que tenha esta interface, antes da resposta de construção deixa o servidor para o cliente.

trans-unit.source: The context property can examine and manipulate the contents of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de contexto pode examinar e manipular os conteúdos do <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called on each client context property that has this interface, when the construction request returns to the client from the server.
trans-unit.target: Chamado para cada propriedade de contexto de cliente que tenha esta interface, quando o pedido de construção devolve ao cliente do servidor.

trans-unit.source: The current method is called on each server context property that implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IContextPropertyActivator> interface when a construction request arrives at a server.
trans-unit.target: O método atual é chamado para cada propriedade de contexto de servidor que implementa o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IContextPropertyActivator>Quando um pedido de construção chega um servidor de interface.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IContextPropertyActivator>

trans-unit.source: This allows the context property to examine the contents of each <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage>.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite que a propriedade de contexto examinar o conteúdo de cada <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se tiver êxito; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called on each client context property that has this interface, when the construction request returns to the client from the server.
trans-unit.target: Chamado para cada propriedade de contexto de cliente que tenha esta interface, quando o pedido de construção devolve ao cliente do servidor.

trans-unit.source: The context property can examine the contents of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de contexto pode examinar o conteúdo do <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se tiver êxito; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether it is all right to activate the object type indicated in the msg parameter.
trans-unit.target: Indica se todos os direitos é para ativar o tipo de objeto indicado a msg parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether the requested type can be activated.
trans-unit.target: Valor booleano que indica se o tipo de pedido pode ser activado.
